website_summaries.verdict: The sturdy aluminum base makes for a stable unit, while the natural bamboo stand creates an attractive look in a model that is easy to assemble.
pros: The stand is made from natural, environmentally-friendly bamboo, which adds additional weight to the already stable aluminum base
The unit comes with a cord specially designed to fit the unit, which includes easy-to-follow assembly instructions
cons: Since the cord is specially designed, after-market replacement cords may not fit perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Very Nicely done, but best if you have a very thin case bottom or no case at all when charging.
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a few nights I can say this.. Pro's : Very Cool look, a Nice solid piece of craftsmanship Con's : Even though there is a mechanism behind the base that lets you pull the top part back or forth to account for Case Side I found my thin case to thick and have to take off my case to charge. With the case on I noticed one night I though I had it on and it didn't charge. So i just take my case off
customer_reviews.author: K. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Works but has its flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The stand actually fits my phone perfectly. Even with different backings on the phone. They include a few different options that can fit different cases with thicker bottoms. So it fits and works great. The issue is the base is slippery, you have to hold it down when you remove the phone. It slides on every surface too, so I think they need to improve the bottom rubber. It also needs a concept to pull the phone out with needing to use two hands. When you pull the phone out of the charger, of course the whole stand comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great-looking "dock" for iPhone and iPad
customer_reviews.text: This isn't so much a dock as a stand with a cable holder, but it works well for what it is. It comes with its own cable, but know that it won't fit an Apple USB-C cable (hence the 4-star review as I was hoping for that). I'm able to charge my iPad 7 with its case on, which is really nice. It is a little flimsy with an iPad on it, but as long as you're not moving it too much it's fine. It's great with an iPhone, very sturdy then. I wouldn't use it with an iPad pro, though.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: Great charge stand for phone with cases
customer_reviews.text: I love my bamboo charge stand. The design is very pretty, modern, yet warm and organic, simple and sturdy. I like the mechanics of the back - that you can adjust the depth of support, the cord catcher underneath to have it stay in place, and the various black cord tip "stays" for different types of phones with different cases. Unfortunately, the two stays for Lifeproof cases were not allowing the cord tip to perch high enough for my Lifeproof case, so I will write to Rerii to send me two more (perhaps they were flawed.) Overall, though, I really like my stand!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve L. Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dock and can be used for different devices.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dock for my iPhone. The bamboo matches my bamboo Apple Watch stand and It looks great in my nightstand with them both being the same material. Unfortunately, my daughter decided she likes it more and since she doesn't have a dock at all for her phone I decided to give it up. The dock came with little adaptor pieces to fit different cables so she was able to use it with her android phone. Now she has a safe place to charge her phone without it getting knocked off the desk or the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: WORTH THE PRICE: This stand is a little more expensive than others including the Amazon Basic iPhone stand/charger. This stand however is well worth the price Pros: -solid base -adjustable fire connector adapters for use of cases -adjustable back to fine tune distance to fire connector Cons: -on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking stand
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good in the house. The wooden base is a little bit darker color in person, but it does actually match our decor. I'm not sure how good the cable is yet, but if I have trouble with it I'll be sure to update the review. Routing the cable through the bottom channel and into the top portion was very easy, and the nice thing about it is if in fact the cable dies after some time (they always do, just a matter of when), the cable can be easily changed for a new one since it's not permanent.
customer_reviews.author: EddieTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, hard to get phone seated properly
customer_reviews.text: LIke the look of this bamboo stand but find it very difficult to connect my phone. I have tried several times to readjust the base but it is hit and miss. Sometimes the connection cord goes right in and other times I have to play with it for several minutes to get it seated properly to ensure it will charge. Pain in the neck so I have purchased a magnetic charger for my phone. Missed the return date unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials
customer_reviews.text: The part that holds your USB cable in place is a plastic fitting and is quite sloppy and won't hold your phone securely. I wrapped some black electrical tape around it a couple of times which solved the problem. The adjustable support for the back of your phone is also quite loose but that was also remedied with some black electrical tape shimming. It's properly weighted and made from solid bamboo and solid aluminum block for a base.
customer_reviews.author: mje

customer_reviews.title: Works as wanted
customer_reviews.text: It’s not really that hard to figure out folks and it looks good! I agree that the riser is unnecessarily tall but not bothered by it. It does hold phone (6s plus) securely which also means it doesn’t just pop off easily when you want to grab it but I would tather have a secure holder.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A

customer_reviews.title: Wood and metal looks. One size fits all functionality
customer_reviews.text: Looks: looks nice except phone appears to be teetering on the lightning connector. Assembly: a little clunky but instructions are decent Functionality: I found myself reseating the phone often, both iPhone 6S with thin case and iPhone 11 Pro with thick case. Neither phone felt well seated, just sitting on and slightly above the connector.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Oneill

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 over the last 2 years for my mother and she loves it, is easy and practical to use! The initial setup requires 2-3 minutes to understand and find the best pieces to match the cable position depending on the iPhone's case and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Waldemar Duarte Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Aesthetics and Look
customer_reviews.text: This product is very useful. Whenever I need to pull something up or look at something this product makes it very easy to do so. Furthermore, the size of it is not what I had expected.I thought it would look very bulky on my desk but on the contrary is very simplistic and add it almost futuristic look to my desk. The price does not even need to be talked about as it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sun

customer_reviews.title: Good looking - Functional
customer_reviews.text: I needed a charging stand for my iPhone that would accommodate my headset at the bottom of the device. This unit adjusts to fit just about any iPhone, even with my OtterBox installed and just clears the headphone plug of my Bose earbuds. Several spacers are provided to ensure a good electronic connection with a variety of iPhones. The wood design looks great. The free charging cable was a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Westerman

customer_reviews.title: SO close to that 5th star.
customer_reviews.text: I've now purchased 4 of these, so obviously I like it (3 phones in my house, plus one for my desk at work). My ONLY complaint is that you really need to use the provided cord for a good fit, and it is very short. That 5th star would have been earned if the provided cable were longer, or if the base would accept other manufacturer's cables.
customer_reviews.author: NetProphet1976

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It's the perfect dock if you want to use your phone at a desk or have it visible on a night stand or side table. The phone sits securely in the stand and the rubber pad on the back keeps it in place. There's also a rubber pad on the base which keeps it from sliding around so you can type without much trouble without having to take the phone off the stand. They also included adapters which adjust the height of the plug to accommodate different depth cell phone cases and it came with a free charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone 7 charging stand
customer_reviews.text: Good engineering went into this, and it has clean, attractive looks. My medium-thick phone case works fine with it (it has a variety of inserts for various case thicknesses). Sturdy, and my phone easily slides into the charger in a smooth motion, no wrestling required to get it seated.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleDave

customer_reviews.title: Quality base but poor quality cable.
customer_reviews.text: The base is nice and sturdy. The black plastic piece doesn't fit very snugly but that doesn't seem to be a problem. However, the lightning charging cable that came with it is very short and does not work. Be prepared to use a different cable.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Pattiecake

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: The silver attachment is loose and wiggles around. The inserts only fit the cord they provide which is too short to be useful to set this on a desk and not the same shape as any other iPhone cord I own (and I own about 7 of them). The cord channel on the bottom is next to impossible to get any cord besides there's in so the stand doesn't sit flat. The wood on the back is also chipped in two places. I won't be able to use this with any other cord so it is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a lot and phone chargers and this one is the one. It is easy to put the phone on even if you have a case on and it comes off easily without damaging the phone. It works well with no complaints. But the on off is a big deal because I need to be able to do a that one-handed while I’m working.
customer_reviews.author: Oh_ChasquidoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great base, but included cable wouldn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I love the base on this charger, but the cable that was included would not charge my phone. I replaced it with a standard cable, but the channel on the bottom of the base is too narrow for a standard cable to fit. I wound up attaching four felt feet on the bottom to allow the base it sit level and provide room for the cable to run underneath. If it weren’t for the cheap and defective cable, this would be a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand, but charger doesn't cut it.
customer_reviews.text: The wooden stand is fairly avant-garde, however the charger just plain old doesn't work. Whether an iPhone or iPad, the unit begins charging when plugged in, but I'm guessing the AC transformer is of inadequate power and quality, and the device never charges. If you like the stand - buy it, but couple it with an Apple AC transformer and cord. You're better served that way.
customer_reviews.author: Ugg obsesser

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, a few problems
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but has a few problems. The cord that comes with it is short, and most replacement cords will not fit the unit. Also, often when you pick up your phone after charging, the part of the stand with the charging plug comes out with the phone and then you have to put the unit back together again. In general it works and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the photo in person
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as the photo in person. Looks kind of funky with an iPhone 6. Cable keeps wanting to rotate out of the way so docking is a pain. Have tried all the adapters included with factory iPhone cable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to use as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive holder. But, I was hoping to easily slide my phone onto the charging base. It has not been that easy for me. This would have been much better if there were guides on each side to lead the phone on to the base properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone stand! It was super easy to put together and is very sturdy. It includes different interchangeable pieces to the part your phone plugs into so it works with all phone cases. It includes a charging cord but you do need a “block” to plug the usb end into to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Oliver

customer_reviews.title: ... electric appliances,he told me that the charger was very useful in his study ,and he can see the new ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes to buy electric appliances,he told me that the charger was very useful in his study ,and he can see the new message at a glance,stop too many papers on the desk for him to find the phone。
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish desk phone charger!
customer_reviews.text: It’s basically easy to use, switching out the black plastic thing for the chord sized can get tedious but once you’ve found the length you like there’s no need to bother with the plastic inserts anymore so not too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond 4

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this as a gift. Product doesn't fit well in the box and when I opened it, it was kind of dirty/dusty inside. The product looks fine. It still as described. It will still work as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cathyrine Pili Bjorgo

customer_reviews.title: Works But Isn't Sturdy At All
customer_reviews.text: Holds my phone up while charging, so that's good. But it slides around all over my desk and my iPhone doesn't sit perfectly flat on the cable end. I don't regret buying it since it's been very useful, though I'll be happy when I find something better.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Nice display
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my dads desk. Instead of just having your phone laying around to charge it has its own place. Looks very organized
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stockman

customer_reviews.title: Easily flip over on the table
customer_reviews.text: The bottom cable doesn't stick inside the hole, make it waggle a lot. Easily flip over on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Outsider

customer_reviews.title: Functional stand with easy set up
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and sturdy stand, no problem with phone case. bamboo finish looks very modern, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dream

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, this seem great. I like that there are different cord holders to accommodate different style cases, very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Ann RouseTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Get a non adjustable one instead.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to use. The cord constantly slips out, and I know I assembled it correctly. I’d reccomend a non adjustable steel one instead, like “G-cord”. That’s the one I got after this and it just works better.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden W

customer_reviews.title: I like the design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, the wood construction, the price. The connector height, despite having come with four different (black) base adjustments, does not fit my iPhone SE or the wife's iPhone 6s skins properly. And our skins, no, they are not some obscure one-off case. They are pretty damn $5.99 normal. So 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Homer Jason Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Doing exactly what I wanted it to do. Easy to use and looks very attractive. The size adjustment for phones with/without covers is nicely designed and it is easy to insert and remove the phone as needed.
customer_reviews.author: BillM

customer_reviews.title: Good base cheap cable
customer_reviews.text: The base itself is a good design, the power cord that was provided was not. Within a month, the adapter cracked and broke when removing the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cris H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent iPhone dock
customer_reviews.text: Been using this stand for the last month and it is quite reliable, even with a case on my iPhone. The charging port is secure and stable and the whole dock is premium to look at on your desk. You're also given a lightning cable and I recommend that you use it for this stand as it will fit it properly. Really nice quality and convenient enough to use.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Too Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This charging stand is flimsy and not weighted enough to stay upright when taking phone off the charger. Also, the cord does not fit well enough in the groove on the bottom of the stand to allow it to stand flat on a surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Reengineer
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay together and clunky and top heavy and wire plug falls out as unsecured. Didn’t send back as threw away packaging..Sits on table unused.
customer_reviews.author: David Kosec

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for dock charging without having to remove any case or cover
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customizable fit for any of ur Apple devices...not the most attractive look but it is Well worth and personal taste compromise.
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! Have it at work and is perfect. Let’s me use phone while it’s charging and gives full view of screen.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: it’s workin out pretty great the cord stays in tight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this since my kitten likes to chew on cords, it’s workin out pretty great the cord stays in tight. The only thing that is bothersome is the black piece where the charger is actually on, it gets loose after taking the phone off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: I love the design of this bamboo charge stand
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this bamboo charge stand. It works very well and compatible with my iphone. Super steady and convenient, really easy for use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Charging Ahead
customer_reviews.text: Nicely put together and on the whole works well. Minor complaint is it is some times hard to align the ipad with the base but it has not been a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chimester

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my bamboo stand. Easy to use. Easy to assemble. Beautiful on my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Mid Ten Dude

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. None of the charger inserts held the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. None of the charger inserts held the lightning plug high enough to fit my phone with an otterbox or life proof case attached. I filled one insert with some putty to fill the space and the now the charger plug sits exactly where I need it. Overall, I would recommend the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I lost the inserts that house the cord in the base and I don’t know how to contact the seller to purchase replacement parts..
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Does just what it states!!
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have a good charging cord it's great. It almost makes charging your iPhone as hassle free as an Anker wireless charger for the iPhone 8s and Xs.
customer_reviews.author: L Stro

customer_reviews.title: it does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective from the beginning. I tried to use it for about 5 months. Finally it stopped working completely I have had to recently buy another charger stand. Do not buy this inferior product and defective product . Del Wilkinson
customer_reviews.author: Del Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Decently weighted so as to not flop around on your nightstand. Accommodates my phone, ipad pro and apple tv remote easily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical about a charger that used a normal ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about a charger that used a normal cord rather than a built in, but this one holds securely and sets well. Plus you could always replace the cable if needed. Only gave it 5 stars cause I can’t give it 6
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until, like someone else said, it didn’t. After less than 90 days, the connection to the charging port of the iPhone broke off, rendering it completely unusable. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Free cord
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in damaged. But not bad. It’s weird to use. Came with a free cord, easy to use. Hard to get phone off cord, looks great on my desk
customer_reviews.author: rachael lewin

customer_reviews.title: Minor inconveniences but would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Hard to connect earbud when phone is on the stand. Also, track is not quite big enough for standard Apple wire. Otherwise it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jot

customer_reviews.title: The stand is nice but the cable included stopped working on the second ...
customer_reviews.text: The stand is nice but the cable included stopped working on the second day. My other cables do not fit into the stand, now I need to buy another cable....
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but it works great! Doesn't tangle my hair and feels wonderfully relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a cool way to charge up your phone and it charges ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a cool way to charge up your phone and it charges pretty fast. I am loving it
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Sum

customer_reviews.title: Needs an eject button
customer_reviews.text: It looks good enough. My only complaint is that I wish it had an eject button. It takes 2 hands to remove the phone. I worry about putting too much force through the lightning port.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Schwemmer

customer_reviews.title: Cable broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months, the charger cable no longer works because of intense crimping due to shape of unit. Back to a flat charger for us:(
customer_reviews.author: Daisyastoria

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I left my charger in hotel. Thought this would be attractive in my kitchen plus a new charger. I couldn’t put darn thing together and had to provide my own wall socket. Should have just bought a charger. All I got from this purchase was charger. Something, at least!
customer_reviews.author: JeanO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looks and style. Charge your phone with the case on.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for Samsung but, you have to drill it out for an Apple. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: daniel berarducci

customer_reviews.title: The different connector options to handle different cases are nice though. I might add some side rails to ...
customer_reviews.text: Construction isn't that solid - phone wobbles back and forth a lot when on the connector. The different connector options to handle different cases are nice though. I might add some side rails to the side to help with the wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: George M. Gehring

customer_reviews.title: iPhone stand has cord
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this iPhone stand for my daughter but she wasn’t happy with it as she wanted a free standing iPhone stand with no cord so I gave it to someone else
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This charge is very perfect, it’s convenient for my daily use
customer_reviews.text: This charge is very perfect,it’s convenient for my daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Ealllen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well made. Returned because iPhone charging cord did not fit thru the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. Beautiful design for our modern place. However, it stopped working and did not charge my device. Disappointed because I did like it.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great charger, just what I was looking for. It’s compact, attractive, sturdy and works great. I just might order another one for my living room
customer_reviews.author: Linda Russell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. It can accommodate my favorite wallet case even when the case is open!!
customer_reviews.author: John_N

customer_reviews.title: Well built and Love it
customer_reviews.text: very good product. I personally like staff made of bamboos, which is very elegant. This charge stand is built well with good design. It makes charging iphone very easy. It can also be used as a stand, so I can watch videos with some nice angel. Cables are hidden well too.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece and totally functional for holding your ipad. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SweetSueRocks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stand to setup an iPod next to my turntable to Stream Spotify... iPod fits perfect... nice bamboo wood.. contrasts well in my rack! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with a thin iPhone case
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable connector was perfect for reaching up into the phone with a thin case.
customer_reviews.author: RogerB

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, flimsy support, not stable
customer_reviews.text: The stand is not very sturdy, and none of the 4 inserts actually support my phone in a stable manner. The support piece that the inserts go in is very wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: HILLARY ROBERTSON

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a real charger, its a stand that a cord feeds through the blottom and plugs into the phone. Its nothing more than a i phone charger cord and a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: iPhone 6 Plus causes it to tip over. Too top heavy. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bowlby

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Many cosmetic flaws but I don’t want to hassle with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon_Roll

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchaser
customer_reviews.text: This sits next to my husband stand and with the face ID unlock it's perfect. You don't have to pick up your phone to unlock it. Well made and it does look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, adapters allow different cases and model phones/ipads to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice for the counter top. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: BAD, Does not Charge
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone says its not using a correct charger. Nice stand, cheap cable. Other cables don't fit inside it because they are too thick. Its now a table weight.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lucido

customer_reviews.title: Unable to take phone with one hand off of the stand.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and well build stand, only thing is that you have to use both hands when you trying to get your phone out of charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ladislav Kobliha

customer_reviews.title: Simple and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's exactly what I needed: no more, no less. I was able to ditch my old alarm clock and just use the iPhone features and a clock app. It's perfect. It looks lovely and works simply. Keep in mind that you'll need your charger brick to plug into an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Crutchfield Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great device. I keep it next to my bed since I use my phone as my alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L. Lobo

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, one at home and one at work. Work great, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Cornett

customer_reviews.title: I would give this 5 stars, but the inserts ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars, but the inserts tey ave me were not enough sizes, so all of the weight of the phone is on the plug bc it sticks out too much
customer_reviews.author: Larisa H

customer_reviews.title: A Solid choice for a charge stand
customer_reviews.text: Solid unit, works very well. Perfect for bedside or the desk. I would like it to be a bit heavier, but not's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the connector wasnt fixed. it was a loose cable and didnt meet my needs. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas schepis

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand. Came with charger too! One hand release. Nice on nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Akers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE becouse is very strong and and so beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thats where the love affair ended
customer_reviews.text: The stand itself is substantial and very well made. Thats where the love affair ended. This beautiful stand comes with this comical cartoonish thin and very short charging cable that wont reach anything. Thought about keeping the stand and just using another charger cord but nope.The cord goes into a cut out groove on the bottom of the stand and is very small so no way will any normal cord will fit. Had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: skababy69

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one months then the charging cable or connector mal functioned. Amazon reimbursed. Looks nice but poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sussbauer

customer_reviews.title: The item is nice looking & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The item is nice looking & sturdy. The cord is horrible, doesn't charge all the time. Late to work 2 times this week because phone didn't charge & alarm didn't go off.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Silver piece came loose. Phone doesn't sit flush and can damage internal charging connection.
customer_reviews.text: The silver piece that the clips go into came loose after 40 days and now wiggles. None of the clips allow the phone to sit flush. This leads to the phone's internal charging connection to loosen.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and it was just what I was looking for. The look and quality are great.
customer_reviews.author: melinda thurston

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a solid, convenient charge stand? Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: A total disappointment. You can't remove your phone with one hand, because it will up root the base piece, which is just hanging in the slot like a loose lego. It doesn't even lock into place. And the back screw holding the resting board doesn't even lock into place. Nothing locks into place. This is a very insecure charge stand. It doesn't come as one piece, so it totally misses the point of having charge stands: the convenience of having charger and stand in one consolidated piece. Shoddy little product.
customer_reviews.author: bmw4b789

customer_reviews.title: Great docking station for I phones!
customer_reviews.text: This docking station does the trick!! Very well made. Includes a lightning cable too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: There is some fault with the concept of this product. Charging wire doesn't fix at one place so each time one has to adjust the wire to plus the phone. There are more chances your wire will stop functions after such pushing and pulling then charging your phone. I didn't find this useful at all and entire family is telling me off for wasting money on this.
customer_reviews.author: rajendra singh

product_meta.title: Rerii iPhone Charger Stand, Bamboo iPhone Docking Station Charger Stand with Aluminum Base for All Versions of iPhone with Lightning Plug
feature_bullets: The iPhone charger stand is made of premium natural bamboo material and its aluminum base is solid and sturdy with enough weight to make the stand plus phone stable, both bamboo and aluminum construction, which offers a good charging experience for you with this docking station charger

With this iPhone charger stand, you can rest your iPhone use it as a display to watch in both horizontal or vertical orientations which provides you a good viewing angle, meanwhile you can watch video or pick up call more comfortable

This iPhone charger stand is adjustable in two ways to fit different sized phone cases.4 different inserts to allow you to choose which one will work with your case; The back rest adjusts with an easy screw adjustment for different thickness backs of the case

Inner the package, iPhone charger stand comes with a lightning cable (3.3feet) for the iPhone charging dock, and please NOTE that the thickness of the iPhone charging cord, it maybe not suitable for the carved slot if you change it with another new or original charging cable ( JUST contact us if the enclosed cable do not work or broken )

The iPhone charger stand station is convenient to charge your iPhone or iPad mini devices at home or in office, so you can do your chores every day without missing a notification’s takes few minutes to set up the charging stand, then you can enjoy the satisfaction of this charging experience
